alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 27 at 3:28PM EST until further notice by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids MI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Michigan... Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River near Comstock Park affecting Kent County. .Heavy rain and snow melt earlier this week may cause rivers to rise to minor flood stage early next week. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Maple River at Maple Rapids. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of County Line Road and a home along County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. The next statement will be issued bySunday afternoon at 530 PM EST.
